message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to consider a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope we can find common ground.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Considering the value of the product, I believe $15,000 would be a fair price for us both.
